import { useContext } from 'react' import '../../contexts/cart.context' import { CartContext } from '../../contexts/cart.context' import './checkout-item.style.scss' const CheckoutItem = ({ item }) => { const { name, id, price, quantity, imageUrl } = item const { increaseItem, decreaseItem, deleteItem } = useContext(CartContext) return (
{name}
❮
{quantity}
❯
 {price}
deleteItem(id)}>✕
) } export default CheckoutItem
